00033 ReportsPDFDialog::ReportsPDFDialog() : QObject(0)
00034 {
00035     settings = Settings::instance();
00036 }

00038 QString ReportsPDFDialog::exec()

00042     int PDFPaperSize = settings->getPDFPaperSizeInt();

00044     QString PDFPaperSizeHeight = settings->getPDFPaperSizeHeight();

00054 
00055     question.dialog = new QDialog(0);

00076     question.defaultPaperSizeLabel = new QLabel(question.dialog);
00077 
00078     if(PDFPaperSize == 3)
00079     {

00081                           + settings->getPDFPaperSizeHeight());
00082         if(PDFPaperSizeUnits == 0)

00085             paperSize += "cm)";
00086         else
00087             paperSize += "mm)";
00088

00090     }
00091     else

00096

00099     question.defaultVBoxLayout->addWidget(question.defaultPermissionsLabel);

00108             "Change Options", question.dialog);

00144                 QStringList("Letter (8.5 x 11in)") << "A4 (8.27 x 11.69in)"

00158             options.paperSizeCustomWidthLineEdit->setText(PDFPaperSizeWidth);

00161         options.paperSizeCustomHBoxLayout->addWidget(options.paperSizeCustomWidthLineEdit);

00164         if(PDFPaperSize != 3)
00165             options.paperSizeCustomBetweenLabel->setEnabled(false);

00231         options.permissionsNoPrint = new QCheckBox("No-Print", options.dialog);
00232         if(PDFPermissionsNoPrint)
00233             options.permissionsNoPrint->setChecked(true);
00234

00245             options.permissionsNoAnnotate->setChecked(true);

00259                                                "Create PDF", options.dialog);
00260         connect(options.buttonCreate, SIGNAL(clicked()), options.dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00261 
00262         options.buttonCancel = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")),
00263                                                "Cancel", options.dialog);
00264         connect(options.buttonCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), options.dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00265 
00266         options.buttonHBoxLayout->addStretch();
00267         options.buttonHBoxLayout->addWidget(options.buttonCreate);
00268         options.buttonHBoxLayout->addWidget(options.buttonCancel);
00269 
00270         if(options.dialog->exec())
00271         {
00272             PDFPaperSize = options.paperSizeComboBox->currentItem();
00273             if(PDFPaperSize == 3)
00274             {
00275                 PDFPaperSizeWidth = options.paperSizeCustomWidthLineEdit->text();
00276                 PDFPaperSizeHeight = options.paperSizeCustomHeightLineEdit->text();
00277                 PDFPaperSizeUnits = options.paperSizeCustomUnitsComboBox->currentItem();
00278             }
00279 
00280             PDFPassword = options.passwordYesRadioButton->isChecked();
00281 
00282             PDFPermissionsNoPrint = options.permissionsNoPrint->isChecked();
00283             PDFPermissionsNoModify = options.permissionsNoModify->isChecked();
00284             PDFPermissionsNoCopy = options.permissionsNoCopy->isChecked();
00285             PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate = options.permissionsNoAnnotate->isChecked();
00286 
00287             delete options.dialog;
00288             delete question.dialog;
00289         }
00290         else
00291         {
00292             delete options.dialog;
00293             delete question.dialog;
00294             return string;
00295         }
00296     }
00297 
00298     if(PDFPassword)
00299     {
00300         password.dialog = new QDialog(0);
00301 
00302         password.vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(password.dialog);
00303         password.vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00304         password.vBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00305 
00306         password.label = new QLabel("<nobr>Enter a password to protect the PDF document.</nobr>", password.dialog);
00307         password.label2 = new QLabel("Note: If you wish not to use a password,<br>leave both fields blank.", password.dialog);
00308 
00309         password.vBoxLayout->addWidget(password.label);
00310         password.vBoxLayout->addSpacing(5);
00311         password.vBoxLayout->addWidget(password.label2);
00312 
00313         password.vBoxLayout->addSpacing(10);
00314 
00315         password.gridLayout = new QGridLayout(password.vBoxLayout, 2, 2, 5);  // rows, cols, spacing
00316 
00317         password.firstLabel = new QLabel("Password:", password.dialog);
00318         password.firstLineEdit = new QLineEdit(password.dialog);
00319         password.firstLineEdit->setMaxLength(20);
00320         password.firstLineEdit->setEchoMode(QLineEdit::Password);
00321 
00322         password.secondLabel = new QLabel("Repeat:", password.dialog);
00323         password.secondLineEdit = new QLineEdit(password.dialog);
00324         password.secondLineEdit->setMaxLength(20);
00325         password.secondLineEdit->setEchoMode(QLineEdit::Password);
00326 
00327         password.gridLayout->addWidget(password.firstLabel, 0, 0);
00328         password.gridLayout->addWidget(password.firstLineEdit, 0, 1);
00329         password.gridLayout->addWidget(password.secondLabel, 1, 0, Qt::AlignRight | Qt::AlignVCenter);
00330         password.gridLayout->addWidget(password.secondLineEdit, 1, 1);
00331 
00332         password.vBoxLayout->addSpacing(10);
00333 
00334         password.hBoxLayout = new QHBoxLayout(password.vBoxLayout);
00335         password.hBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00336 
00337         password.createButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/exportPDF.png")),
00338                                                 "Create PDF", password.dialog);
00339         connect(password.createButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), password.dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00340 
00341         password.cancelButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")),
00342                                                 "Cancel", password.dialog);
00343         connect(password.cancelButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), password.dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00344 
00345         password.hBoxLayout->addStretch();
00346         password.hBoxLayout->addWidget(password.createButton);
00347         password.hBoxLayout->addWidget(password.cancelButton);
00348 
00349         bool accepted = false;
00350         while(password.dialog->exec())
00351         {
00352             if(password.firstLineEdit->text() == password.secondLineEdit->text())
00353             {
00354                 PDFPasswordString = password.firstLineEdit->text();
00355                 accepted = true;
00356                 break;
00357             }
00358             password.label->setText("<nobr>The passwords did not match.  Try again.</nobr>");
00359         }
00360         delete password.dialog;
00361 
00362         if(!accepted)
00363             return string;
00364     }
00365 
00366     if(PDFPaperSize == 0)
00367         string += "--size letter ";
00368     if(PDFPaperSize == 1)
00369         string += "--size a4 ";
00370     if(PDFPaperSize == 2)
00371         string += "8.27x11.69in ";
00372     if(PDFPaperSize == 3)
00373     {
00374         string += "--size " + PDFPaperSizeWidth + "x" + PDFPaperSizeHeight;
00375         if(PDFPaperSizeUnits == 0)
00376             string += "in ";
00377         if(PDFPaperSizeUnits == 1)
00378             string += "cm ";
00379         if(PDFPaperSizeUnits == 2)
00380             string += "mm ";
00381     }
00382 
00383     if(PDFPassword || PDFPermissionsNoPrint || PDFPermissionsNoModify || PDFPermissionsNoCopy || PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate)
00384         string += "--encryption ";
00385 
00386     if(PDFPassword)
00387         string += "--user-password \"" + PDFPasswordString + "\" ";
00388 
00389     if(PDFPermissionsNoPrint || PDFPermissionsNoModify || PDFPermissionsNoCopy || PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate)
00390     {
00391         if(PDFPermissionsNoPrint)
00392             string += "--permissions no-print ";
00393         if(PDFPermissionsNoModify)
00394             string += "--permissions no-modify ";
00395         if(PDFPermissionsNoCopy)
00396             string += "--permissions no-copy ";
00397         if(PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate)
00398             string += "--permissions no-annotate ";
00399     }
00400 
00401     settings->setPDFPaperSize(PDFPaperSize);
00402     settings->setPDFPaperSizeWidth(PDFPaperSizeWidth);
00403     settings->setPDFPaperSizeHeight(PDFPaperSizeHeight);
00404     settings->setPDFPaperSizeUnits(PDFPaperSizeUnits);
00405     settings->setPDFPassword(PDFPassword);
00406     settings->setPDFPermissionsNoPrint(PDFPermissionsNoPrint);
00407     settings->setPDFPermissionsNoModify(PDFPermissionsNoModify);
00408     settings->setPDFPermissionsNoCopy(PDFPermissionsNoCopy);
00409     settings->setPDFPermissionsNoAnnotate(PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate);
00410 
00411     return string;
00412 }
00413 
00414 void ReportsPDFDialog::paperSizeChanged(int index)
00415 {
00416     if(index != 3)
00417     {
00418         options.paperSizeCustomWidthLineEdit->setEnabled(false);
00419         options.paperSizeCustomBetweenLabel->setEnabled(false);
00420         options.paperSizeCustomHeightLineEdit->setEnabled(false);
00421         options.paperSizeCustomUnitsComboBox->setEnabled(false);
00422     }
00423     else
00424     {
00425         options.paperSizeCustomWidthLineEdit->setEnabled(true);
00426         options.paperSizeCustomBetweenLabel->setEnabled(true);
00427         options.paperSizeCustomHeightLineEdit->setEnabled(true);
00428         options.paperSizeCustomUnitsComboBox->setEnabled(true);
00429     }
00430 }
00431 
00432 void ReportsPDFDialog::passwordNoClicked()
00433 {
00434     options.passwordYesRadioButton->setChecked(false);
00435     options.passwordNoRadioButton->setChecked(true);
00436 }
00437 
00438 void ReportsPDFDialog::passwordYesClicked()
00439 {
00440     options.passwordNoRadioButton->setChecked(false);
00441     options.passwordYesRadioButton->setChecked(true);
00442 }
